h2.div: Kindergarten Registration and Childfind postponed until further notice.
School Administrative Unit #71 Lempster School District

div.p: Under the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act, the school district is committed to providing all educationally disabled children between the ages of three and twenty-one years of age, who live within the district, with a free and appropriate education. Eligible students who have left school prior to graduation have a right to return to receive special education services until graduation or twenty-one years of age. A disabled student, who does not qualify for services under IDEA, may qualify for accommodations under section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973. To make a referral please contact Dr. Betsy Gibbs, Director of Student Services at (603)-863-2420 x120.

Preschool/K Developmental Screening and Kindergarten Registration is being held at Lempster Community School on Friday, March 20, 2020. Please call Ms. Howard at (603)-863-1080 x126 to set up an appointment.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

Please contact Ralph Peterson - Principal - 603-863-1080 Extension - 125 or rpeterson@sau71.org for more information.
